detectors.description:
Pitch.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pitch.sol#77-82) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pitch.sol#79)
detectors.markdown:
[Pitch.transfer(address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pitch.sol#L77-L82) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- [balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pitch.sol#L79)

detectors.description:
Pitch.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pitch.sol#84-90) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[from] = safeSub(balances[from],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pitch.sol#85)
	- balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pitch.sol#87)

	- [balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pitch.sol#L87)

detectors.description:
Pitch.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pitch.sol#59-61) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- _totalSupply - balances[address(0)] (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pitch.sol#60)
detectors.markdown:
[Pitch.totalSupply()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pitch.sol#L59-L61) may have integer overflow

detectors.description: Variable Pitch._totalSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pitch.sol#39) is not in mixedCase

Pitch.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pitch.sol#49-57) uses literals with too many digits:
	- _totalSupply = 1400000000000000000000000 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pitch.sol#53)

detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pitch.sol#8)
	- Pitch.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pitch.sol#59-61)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pitch.sol#9)
	- Pitch.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pitch.sol#63-65)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- Pitch.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pitch.sol#67-69)
	- ERC20Interface.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pitch.sol#10)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pitch.sol#11)
	- Pitch.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pitch.sol#77-82)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- Pitch.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pitch.sol#71-75)
	- ERC20Interface.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pitch.sol#12)

safeMul(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SafeMath.safeMul(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pitch.sol#28)

safeDiv(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SafeMath.safeDiv(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pitch.sol#28-30)
function approve(address spender, uint tokens) public returns (bool success) { (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pitch.sol)#71
